a.detail: The walls here have been engraved with geometric patterns
a.summary: The walls here have been engraved with geometric patterns

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful good fighter as a temple. Its creator was destroyed by a natural disaster, and the dungeon has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Iron Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

2100 cp, 900 sp, 70 gp, a bone comb inlaid with a filigree of gold (25 gp), a copper pendant inlaid with a meandros of gold (25 gp), a fine leather mantle tooled with elven script (25 gp), a pewter coffer set with rhodochrosite (25 gp), an ivory comb engraved with spirals (25 gp), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "It's a trap" on the west wall, and the ceiling is covered with pale stalactites

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.2: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.3: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.4: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.5: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.6: Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
